result.name: Identification of genetic defects in families segregating rare genetic disorders using next generation genomic tools
result.description: To delineate novel genetic loci linked with rare genetic disorders in families segregating hereditary genetic disorders of using whole genome SNP genotyping followed by discovery of novel gene using whole exome sequencing. Use of identified variants to establish genotype-phenotype correlation
result.center: Center for Genetics and Inherited Diseases, Taibah University
